General.Name: TQR Public Company Limited
General.Description: TQR Public Company Limited provides reinsurance broker and integrated risk transfer services in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Traditional Business, Alternatives Business, and Other Services. It offers treaty and facultative reinsurance services; and motor car, motorcycle, extended warranty, travel, cyber security, medical malpractice, and director and officer liability insurance services. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
